  2. OpenAI's ChatGPT Mac app was storing conversations in plain text  The Verge
  3. OpenAI hit by two big security issues this week  Engadget
  4. ChatGPT users on macOS shocked to learn chats were stored unencrypted  Cointelegraph
  5. ChatGPT Mac security flaw raises red flags ahead of Apple Intelligence integration  Macworld

item.title: Steam Giving Away New Horror Game With 'Very Positive' Reviews for Free - GameRant
item.description:
1. Steam Giving Away New Horror Game With 'Very Positive' Reviews for Free  GameRant
  2. New Steam Game Is 100% Free, but Not for Long  ComicBook.com
  3. This newly-released horror game is completely free to keep on Steam for the next 2 days  PC Guide - For The Latest PC Hardware & Tech News
